data.comment: The big names in today's match at Allianz Parque have now been confirmed.
The first-half is now underway.
In the minute 1, Can Bragantino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
Gabriel Menino is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Gabriel Menino has recovered and rejoins the match in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 3, Palmeiras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Patrick de Paula of Palmeiras is pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 6, Raphael Claus awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Palmeiras.
Thonny Anderson of Bragantino gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 10, Goal kick for Palmeiras at Allianz Parque.
Bragantino to take a throw-in in Palmeiras territory.
Raphael Claus signals a Palmeiras throw-in in Bragantino's half.
In the minute 11, Palmeiras's Patrick de Paula breaks free at Allianz Parque. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Throw-in for Palmeiras at Allianz Parque.
In the minute 12, Ball safe as Palmeiras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Bragantino are coming forward and Ricardo Ryller gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Palmeiras have a goal kick.
In the minute 15, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Tomas Cuello for Bragantino who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Gabriel Menino.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 19, Palmeiras’s Gabriel Menino is on his feet again at Allianz Parque.
Bragantino's Tomas Cuello looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Tomas Cuello for Bragantino gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 20, Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
Palmeiras surge into the attack at Allianz Parque but Matias Vina’s header is off-target.
In the minute 21, Raphael Claus awards Bragantino a goal kick.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Bragantino.
In the minute 24, Ball goes out of play for a Bragantino goal kick.
Raphael Claus signals a throw-in for Palmeiras, close to Bragantino's area.
Throw-in Bragantino.
In the minute 28, Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Goal! A Luiz Adriano header gives Palmeiras a 1-0 lead in Sao Paulo.
Gabriel Menino instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Palmeiras at Allianz Parque.
Bragantino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bragantino have a goal kick.
In the minute 33, Throw-in Bragantino.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Raphael Claus awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 35, Bragantino's Tomas Cuello misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Palmeiras at Allianz Parque.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Palmeiras in their own half.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
In Sao Paulo Bragantino attack through Tomas Cuello. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 39, Raphael Claus awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 43, Attention is being given to Bragantino’s Alerrandro and play has been suspended briefly.
Alerrandro returns to the field for Bragantino after picking up a slight injury.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
Raphael Claus will wait an extra 6 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Breno Lopes (Palmeiras) fires in a shot – and hits the post!
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Goal kick for Bragantino at Allianz Parque.
In the minute 45, In Sao Paulo, Thonny Anderson of Bragantino is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
At Allianz Parque the fourth official shows that 7 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Bragantino are pushing forward but Alerrandro's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
Patrick de Paula is back on the pitch.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Bragantino in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Luiz Adriano (Palmeiras) has received a first yellow card.
Patrick de Paula is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
The second-half is underway in Sao Paulo.
Ball safe as Palmeiras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 46, Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 46, Mauricio Barbieri is making the team's first substitution at Allianz Parque with Claudinho replacing Thonny Anderson.
Ytalo is replacing Alerrandro for Bragantino at Allianz Parque.
Can Bragantino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
In the minute 49, Bragantino drive upfield and Aderlan gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Palmeiras defender.
Bragantino have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Bragantino goal kick.
In the minute 51, The match at Allianz Parque has been interrupted briefly for a check on Fabricio Bruno, who is down injured.
Fabricio Bruno for Bragantino is back on the field again.
Free kick Bragantino.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Palmeiras close to the penalty box.
Bragantino's Aderlan misses with an attempt on goal.
Corner awarded to Bragantino.
In the minute 56, Raphael Claus awards the home team a throw-in.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
Corner awarded to Bragantino.
In the minute 58, Raphael Claus awards Bragantino a goal kick.
Raphael Claus waits before resuming play because Gabriel Veron for Palmeiras is still down.
Abel Ferreira (Palmeiras) is making a first substitution, with Raphael Veiga replacing Lucas Lima.
In the minute 61, Willian is on a sub for Luiz Adriano for Palmeiras.
The home team have replaced Gabriel Veron with Gustavo Scarpa. This is the third substitution made today by Abel Ferreira.
Bragantino make their third substitution with Lucas Evangelista replacing Ricardo Ryller.
In the minute 64, Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
Bragantino drive into the zone and Fabricio Bruno is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Bragantino at Allianz Parque.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Palmeiras needs to be cautious. Bragantino have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 68, Corner awarded to Bragantino.
Bragantino push forward at Allianz Parque and Fabricio Bruno gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Palmeiras defence.
Palmeiras will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Bragantino.
In the minute 70, Claudinho (Bragantino) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Bragantino pushes forward through Tomas Cuello, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 71, Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
The home team replace Patrick de Paula with Emerson Santos.
Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
In the minute 72, Bragantino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Leandrinho is replacing Tomas Cuello for the away team.
Ytalo (Bragantino) gets in a header but the ball hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
In the minute 74, Goal kick for Palmeiras at Allianz Parque.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
Bragantino drives forward and Ytalo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 77, Aderlan for Bragantino is whistled offside.
The home team have replaced Breno Lopes with Marcos Rocha. This is the fifth substitution made today by Abel Ferreira.
Can Palmeiras capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bragantino's half?
In the minute 79, Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gabriel Menino (Palmeiras) gets a yellow card.
Bragantino's Lucas Evangelista gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 80, Raphael Claus awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
Bragantino's Artur gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Palmeiras have a goal kick.
In the minute 82, Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
Danilo for Palmeiras gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 83, The away team replace Edimar with Weverson.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
In Sao Paulo Bragantino attack through Lucas Evangelista. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 85, Raphael Claus awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
Goal kick for Palmeiras at Allianz Parque.
Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Bragantino.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
Raphael Veiga is booked for the home team.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in high up the field for Palmeiras in Sao Paulo.
Palmeiras's Raphael Veiga breaks free at Allianz Parque. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Bragantino have a goal kick.
Bragantino's Fabricio Bruno gets in a shot on goal at Allianz Parque. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
Leandrinho's header is off-target for Bragantino.
Goal kick for Palmeiras at Allianz Parque.
Throw-in Palmeiras.
Can Bragantino capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Palmeiras's half?
The match is over. Final score 1-0.
